title: Swarna Chandbali Jhumkas with Ruby Accent
features: Intricately designed Chandbali base adorned with sparkling cubic zirconia, features a ruby at the top and a pearl drop in the center. The delicate jhumka dangles at the bottom add movement and grace. The gold work showcases excellent craftsmanship.
occasions: and traditional celebrations such as Seemantham or half-saree functions. Adds a touch of elegance to modern events as well.
description: A fusion of traditional South Indian design with modern sensibilities. High-quality materials and craftsmanship ensure durability and lasting beauty. The Chandbali design is culturally significant and a timeless classic, enhanced with the sparkle of cubic zirconia for a contemporary appeal.
